OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HILLSBOROUGH HAWKS AMATEUR RUGBY LEAGUE FOOTBALL CLUB

Desc.entry: At present there is an open age (senior) male team and 6 junior male teams, ranging from the under 9s to under 18s. Matches are played on either Saturday or Sunday, with training on various days during the week. Coaching facilities are available for people of all ages and at all levels. The first team plays in the Pennine League Division 4.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Please contact for days and times
